function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to use proper PPE","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Training on proper PPE use, regular PPE inspections","Technologies":"PPE inspection tools, training materials","People":"Workers in all risk groups","Owner":"Workplace management"},{"Description":"Improper fit or seal of respirators","Impact":"Reduced protection against breathing, coughing, or sneezing droplets","Mitigation":"Fit testing, user seal check, proper sizing","Technologies":"Fit testing equipment, user seal check tools","People":"Healthcare workers, workers in high-risk jobs","Owner":"Health and safety specialists, workplace management"}]}
